short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to save exs.lv miniblogs for later reading.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When you visit a miniblog on exs.lv, a new icon near the name of the author will be added. This will let you store the miniblog for later reading.

You can access your miniblogs by hovering over "Miniblogs" button in the navigation bar.
